courses.advice_detail_en: It is quite cold. Long sleeves, tights, and a windproof jacket are recommended. Light breeze with little impact on running. Some snow or meltwater on the surface may cause slipperiness. Trail running shoes or shoes with good grip are recommended. Air quality is moderate. Consider a mask if you are sensitive to fine dust. Extra cautions: Night caution. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.

courses.advice_detail_en: Chilly conditions. Long sleeves and tights or light layering are recommended. Almost no wind, good for maintaining your pace. Some snow or meltwater on the surface may cause slipperiness. Trail running shoes or shoes with good grip are recommended. Air quality is moderate. Consider a mask if you are sensitive to fine dust. Extra cautions: Night caution. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.

courses.advice_detail_en: Chilly conditions. Long sleeves and tights or light layering are recommended. Almost no wind, good for maintaining your pace. Some snow or meltwater on the surface may cause slipperiness. Trail running shoes or shoes with good grip are recommended. Air quality is moderate. Consider a mask if you are sensitive to fine dust. Extra cautions: Night caution. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
